extendedInfo.description: This mobile application allow you to read and share articles from the Christian Post online newspaper.About Christian PostChristianPost.com is the nationâs most comprehensive Christian news website and was launched in July 2000 with the vision of delivering up-to-date news, information, and commentaries relevant to Christians across denominational lines.As the flagship website of The Christian Post, ChristianPost.com has quickly grown to become a leading online Christian news publication, with continuous updates throughout the day - seven days a week.   Through this mobile application, The Christian Post presents national and international coverage of current events affecting and involving Christian leaders, church bodies, ministries, mission agencies, schools, businesses, and the general Christian public.  As a pan-denominational Christian media source, The Christian Post views all Christ-centered denominations as equal constituents of the body of Christ and does not promote or demote any Christ-centered denomination and/or congregation.  The Christian Post is a member of the Evangelical Press Association, a member of the National Association of Evangelicals, and a global partner of the World Evangelical Alliance.

reviews.title: Content
reviews.comment: I love being able to read CP anywhere....recently though, none of the articles are showing up on my app.  Thank you for looking into this so I can read again!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yay Post! Boo App.
reviews.comment: App needs more customization like a good e-reader. For example, the reader has no control over how text appears. It\'s way too small on my 7\" Android. Needs user-definable preferences.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great reporting. Relevant news. Occasional force close, but second try works. DroidX
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: The content is great, when the app can find it, about 75% of the time.  The app works well, except that each time I open it, the first time it crashes and has to be reopened.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Toughie
reviews.comment: I loved it....hooked! Then the articles won\'t open, sadness
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Interesting app
reviews.comment: I would have given this 5 stars but I constantly get force closes on my galaxy s3 Android phone.
reviews.author: Mawa Vawa

reviews.title: Great when it works...
reviews.comment: I loved the app and the articles but what I hated was when it wouldn\'t let me open the thing and would just instantly force close on me. Please fix this problem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What\'s up?
reviews.comment: Was good, now just opens to a screen showing developers name.  Can\'t see any news
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great job!
reviews.comment: It appears there are less dead links than there used to be. CP is easy to navigate and looks great. Great source for news with a Christian world view.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like it, but most of the articles are dead links.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: DO NOT UPDATE! I used to love this app, now it\'s useless. Boo. Please fix! Droid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Adam
reviews.comment: Wish there were news notifications, but other than that a great source of Christian news.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Abiah advertisement
reviews.comment: Loved the app until the makers put their link in it. Now its the only thing there. No news or other possible links. Just the advertisement. What a waste
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Suddenly stopped working
reviews.comment: A few days ago, the app stopped showingany stories.  I uninstalled it, then reinstalled, but the problem persists.  I\'m very sad I can no longer access this news site.  Please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.comment: Loved the app and then it showed no articles.  Reinstalled, no help.  What a shame!  It had great content.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like it!
reviews.comment: This is a really awesome app. I would recommend this to everyone! Very inspiring stories!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs text controls
reviews.comment: I am enjoying this app but it needs some options that allow for increasing the text size. Its hard to read because its so small. I see others have this same problem. Please fix. 5 stars are waiting. Thanks. God Bless.
reviews.author: Karlton Merritt

reviews.title: Frustrated
reviews.comment: I really liked this app orginally, but now 3/4 of the articles say they are unavailable. This has happened for couple of months now. Please fix this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great articles, but...
reviews.comment: Won\'t let me share articles to facebook...Uninstalled, reinstalled, and still can\'t post articles to facebook.  Also force closes frequently.  I\'ve also emailed about not being able to share articles multiple times and have never received a response.  - LG Lucid  Wikl noy even open on my Samsung Galaxy s3
reviews.author: Matthew McLellan

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: One of my favorite apps!
reviews.author: A Google User
